alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 9:31PM CST until February 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...PROLONGED PERIOD OF WINTRY PRECIPITATION EXPECTED ACROSS THE AREA... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 9 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations over 6 inches are expected along and north of Highway 8. Lower totals, along with a period of wintry mix is expected farther south. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 9 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the commutes Monday evening through Tuesday evening. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration event. Lulls or breaks in the precipitation are expected at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
